name: Tomato
description: Fresh red tomatoes grown in open field, rich in vitamins and perfect for salad or cooking.

name: Mango (Himsagar)
description: Premium Himsagar mangoes, sweet and aromatic, cultivated using organic methods.

name: Wheat
description: High-yield wheat variety grown for bread production, harvested carefully for best quality.

name: Brinjal (Eggplant)
description: Fresh purple brinjals grown under shade nets to ensure smooth skin and long shelf life.

name: Banana (Cavendish)
description: Sweet Cavendish bananas grown in sustainable plantations, ready for domestic and export markets.

name: Rice (Boro)
description: Top quality Boro rice harvested this season, milled to high standard, ideal for everyday consumption.

name: Potato
description: Fresh potatoes dug and cleaned, suited for frying or boiling, stored in cool conditions for freshness.

name: Mango (Amrapali)
description: Amrapali mangoes, colourful and flavourful hybrid variety, grown under controlled conditions.

name: Maize (Corn)
description: Yellow maize kernels grown on large acreage, suitable for human consumption and animal feed.
